recipe.title: Gerrys Banana and Pecan Cake
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 170 and line a loaf tin with baking paper. Place pecans on a tray and cook for 5-10 minutes. Once cool to handle roughly chop and set aside.

Combine bananas, eggs and sugar in the bowl of electric mixer. While mixing slowly add the milk, oil and a pinch of salt. When combine add flour, bicarbonate soda and baking powder. Mix for 3-5 minutes or until mixture is combined. Stir through pecans and chopped chocolate, then pour into prepared tin. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until done. Best served immediately out of the oven!
